name: Cravespace
description:
A roguelike made for 7DRL 2023. Search space for your rivals and eliminate them!

Controls

  • arrow keys / numpad / vi keys: movement
  • 1: primary weapon (fires up)
  • 2: secondary weapon (short range damaging beam)
  • space: smart bomb (dropped from enemies, hopefully)
  • hover over things with mouse to see what they are
